Token.Abstract: Methods for appending NSString instances to mutable attributed strings
Appends a string with the same attributes as this string to this string.

Parameter.Name: string
Parameter.Abstract: The string to be appended to this string.

Token.Abstract: Appends a string with a given paragraph style and font to this string.

Parameter.Name: string
Parameter.Abstract: The string to be appended to this string.

Parameter.Name: paragraphStyle
Parameter.Abstract: Paragraph style to be attributed to the appended string.

Parameter.Name: fontDescriptor
Parameter.Abstract: Font descriptor to be attributed to the appended string.

Token.Abstract: Appends a string without any attributes.

Parameter.Name: string
Parameter.Abstract: The string to be appended to this string without any attributes.
